data.actual_result: The spacing is very inconsistent. For this one, it is way too close to each other.
data.expected_result: The spacing should be spacious enough, like the other models.
data.short_description: Space between "Welcome to the server" and the new invite box is way too close.
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to the top of a channel that you don't own, to find the "Welcome to the server" and the new invite box. - Observe the spacing.
